WorkItem.Description:
Rawr b4.0.10.0
 
Open Rawr, open the filters pane, apply the "Reset" button.  Observe many items in the "head" slot.
 
Now Disable 359-378 Tier 11 and observe that "Membrane of C'Thun" disappears from the list, as expected.
 
Close and re-open Rawr.  Open the filters pane again and drill down into the "Disable Item Level" branch.  Observe that although "Disable 359-378 Tier 11" is checked, "Disable by item level" doesn't show the "some children checked" indicator and that "Membrane of C'Thun" is visible again.
 
Workround: unchecking and re-checking "Disable 359-378 Tier 11" sets the "some checked" indicator on "Disable by Item level" and also makes "Membrane of C'Thun" disappear again.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Some Parent Filters not Applied on Startup

Comments.Message:
I am aware of this issue and have tried to fix it before and failed.

Another work-around: Load the character in a second time and that usually fixes it.
I haven't seen this happen for a while and I think someone may have inadvertently fixed it at some point.
